title: Flowing Maxi Dress with Tiered Skirt
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a flowing maxi dress with tiered skirt, short flutter sleeves, V-neckline, made from lightweight chiffon, solid dusty rose color, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and trims
techpack: Maxi length A-line dress with three tiered skirt panels, short flutter sleeves, V-neckline, invisible back zipper closure, chiffon outer with polyester lining, finished with narrow waistband seam for subtle shaping.
provenance: Inspired by the 'Maxi' length trend for commercial womenswear.
design_text:
Flowing Maxi Dress with Tiered Skirt (MX2024-001)
Colors: dusty rose, soft blush, warm beige
Fabrics: lightweight chiffon, polyester lining
Prints/Patterns: none
Garment Type: dress
Silhouette: A-line tiered
Sleeves: short flutter sleeves
Neckline: V-neckline
Length: maxi
Style / Fit: r, e, l, a, x, e, d,  , f, i, t
